summary: Completed frontend testing of Single Duty Panel and Group Duty Panel UI changes. All features working correctly - personnel dropdown with search and Available/Unavailable tabs functional in both panels, Location field successfully removed from Group Duty Panel.
passed_tests: Single Duty Panel - Personnel dropdown button opens dropdown
Single Duty Panel - Search field inside dropdown visible and functional
Single Duty Panel - Available tab visible and active by default
Single Duty Panel - Unavailable tab visible
Single Duty Panel - Tab switching filters personnel list (Available shows Alpha/Bravo, Unavailable shows Delta)
Single Duty Panel - Selecting personnel closes dropdown and shows selected name
Single Duty Panel - Add Personnel button enabled after selection
Group Duty Panel - Opens correctly for group-type duties (Test, Flight Ops Team)
Group Duty Panel - Location field is NOT present (successfully removed)
Group Duty Panel - Duties section visible with Configure Duties option
Group Duty Panel - Configure and Add Duties modal opens correctly
Group Duty Panel - PersonnelDropdown shows Available/Unavailable tabs
Group Duty Panel - Search input visible in PersonnelDropdown
Group Duty Panel - Tab switching filters personnel list
Group Duty Panel - Available tab shows Alpha/Bravo personnel
Group Duty Panel - Unavailable tab shows Delta personnel
seed_data_creation: N/A - used existing seeded duties and personnel data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Single Duty Panel (DutySlotPanel.js) and Group Duty Panel (GroupDutyPanel.js) have been updated with dropdown-style personnel selection. Both panels use Available/Unavailable tabs for filtering personnel. Location field has been removed from GroupDutyPanel. PersonnelDropdown.js is a reusable component used in GroupDutyPanel with showTabs=true by default. Test cells can be accessed via data-testid like 'cell-{dutyId}-{timeSlot}'. Group duties have duty_type='group' in the API response.
